# bracelet-shopping Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-05

## Active Technologies

- TypeScript 5.x with Next.js 14.x, Node.js 18+ + Next.js (frontend), Prisma (ORM), Stripe (payments), Tailwind CSS (styling), NextAuth.js (authentication) (001-bracelet-platform)

## Project Structure

```text
backend/
frontend/
tests/
```

## Commands

npm test && npm run lint

## Code Style

TypeScript 5.x with Next.js 14.x, Node.js 18+: Follow standard conventions
